page.para: There is go/ing to be a par/ty. The par/ty is on/ly for an/i/mals with horns.
Rab/bit is sad. He does not have horns. But he wants to go to the par/ty.
Rab/bit has an i/de/a. He will make some horns!
Rab/bit puts on the horns. Now he can go to the par/ty.
Rab/bit has a good time at the par/ty. He eats and drinks a lot.
Rab/bit is tired now. He goes to sleep, and the horns fall off!
The an/i/mals see that Rab/bit tricked them! They are an/gry. They tug at his ears.
And that is why rab/bits have long ears!
